title: Mum creates brilliant Pennywise Halloween outfit for son - and it costs just £21
text:

One mum has set a terrifyingly high standard this Halloween with her homemade Pennywise costume creation.

Although it's tempting to hit the shops to bag ready-made spooky looks for your little ones, this might just prove that putting a personal touch on things is worth all the effort in the end.

In a post on the Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group Facebook group, the mum shared an image of her scarily-realistic outfit which has since had more than 28,000 likes and 4,000 comments.

With a simple caption, she reveals she pieced the costume together for just £21, using Primark tights, a £2 wig from Amazon, a £19 costume, a leftover balloon from a birthday party and last year's face paint.

(Image: Facebook)

Other members were very impressed with the creation, with one saying: "OMG wow but I think I would be running in the other direction if I saw this lol. Well done, it's fantastic."

Another commented: "Scary! Amazing but really gives me the creeps."

A third said: "This is great... I mean I wouldn't be opening my door on Halloween night. Officially the creepiest child I have seen. Fab job!"

Turning film characters into Halloween costumes can often divide opinion, as Fashion Nova found out recently after shoppers said the brand's racy Toy- Story-inspired outfits were 'ruining childhoods' .

The American retailer created very revealing looks resembling Woody, Buzz Lightyear and the Pizza Planet aliens - and you'd have to be very brave to wear them.

Although the costumes have proved to be a big hit as they continue to sell out fast, others were unhappy that their sacred childhood heroes had been given a sexy makeover.
description: The Pennywise costume is so good people said they would be running in the other direction if they saw her son on Halloween
